description: Escalation detection evaluation dataset - 50 multi-turn conversations

conversation.content: Hi, I'd like to check on my order status.
I'd be happy to help! Could you provide your order number?
It's ORDER-12345
How long does standard shipping take?
Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days.
Thanks, that works for me!
I want to return a sweater I bought last week.
No problem! I can help with that return. Do you have the order number?
Yes, it's ORDER-54321. The sweater doesn't fit.
Do you have this jacket in size medium?
I'm a bit frustrated that my package is delayed, but I understand there are shipping issues. Can you give me an updated delivery date?
The color of the item looks different than the picture. Not thrilled about it but I'll keep it anyway.
Can I change my shipping address? I moved last week.
Let me check if your order has shipped yet.
Okay, thanks for checking.
What's your return policy?
I received an email about my loyalty points. How do I redeem them?
The website was slow earlier but it's working now. Just wanted to let you know.
I want to speak to a manager right now.
Can you connect me with a human? I don't want to talk to a bot.
Transfer me to customer service immediately. This is unacceptable.
I need to talk to a real person about this. Your automated system isn't helping.
Let me speak to your supervisor. I've been dealing with this issue for a week.
This is the fourth time I've contacted you about my missing refund!
I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me check on that for you.
That's what the last three agents said and nothing happened!
I've already explained this problem three times. Why do I have to keep repeating myself?
My issue still isn't resolved from last week.
I'm sorry to hear that. Can you tell me what the issue is?
I already explained it twice. You should have this on file. I'm done explaining.
This is my FIFTH email about the same issue. At this point I just want someone who can actually fix this.
I was told this would be resolved within 24 hours. That was a week ago. I've called back three times since then.
THIS IS ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS! I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR THREE WEEKS FOR MY ORDER!
Your company is a complete joke. I'm going to leave reviews everywhere about how terrible this service is.
I'm done with this crap. If you can't fix this today, I'm taking my business to your competitor permanently.
This is the worst customer service I've ever experienced. I'm filing a complaint with the BBB.
I swear to god if you don't fix this I'm going to lose my mind. This is BEYOND unacceptable.
What the hell is wrong with your company? Do you people even know what you're doing?
I'm so angry right now I can barely type. You've charged my card TWICE and now I can't pay my rent.
I received the wrong item, was charged for shipping, and now my promotional code won't work on the reorder. This is a mess.
I know it's past the return window, but I was in the hospital. Can you make an exception?
I want compensation for all the trouble this has caused. I've spent hours on this and had to take time off work.
Your product caused damage to my property. I need to know how to file a claim and what your liability coverage is.
I was charged for a subscription I never signed up for. This looks like fraud to me and I'm considering contacting my bank.
I'm a business customer with over $50,000 in annual purchases. I need someone with authority to discuss our contract terms.
My child found a sharp piece of plastic inside the product. This is a serious safety hazard.
The product started smoking when I plugged it in. I'm worried it could have caused a fire.
I had an allergic reaction to your product even though the ingredients listed don't include the allergen.
The battery in the device is swelling. I think it might be dangerous.
I cut myself badly on broken packaging. This needs immediate attention and I may need to see a doctor.
I'm a little annoyed the delivery was a day late, but at least it arrived. Thanks for your help.
Can you help me track my package? The tracking number isn't working on the website.
I'd be happy to look that up for you. What's the order number?
ORDER-78901. Thanks for helping!
Not super happy with the quality but I'll give it another try with a different product.
I accidentally ordered two of the same item. Can I cancel one?
I'm at my wit's end. I've been on hold for an hour, chatted with three different people, and STILL no one can tell me where my order is. This is absolutely pathetic.

scenarios.notes: Long wait times, multiple contacts, strong language

conversation.content: I need to return a gift but I don't have the receipt and the person who bought it is no longer alive. Is there any way to make this work?
I appreciate you trying to help, but this issue is too complicated for a chatbot. Please transfer me to a human representative.

scenarios.notes: Polite but clear request for human

conversation.content: Do you have any promotions running right now?
I'd like to leave some positive feedback. Your delivery driver was very friendly and careful with my package!
OK so last time I was told to do X, and it didn't work. Then I was told to do Y, and that didn't work either. Now what?
My lawyer will be in touch if this isn't resolved by end of day. I'm not joking.
The app crashed while I was placing an order. Can you check if the order went through?
